18: בְּאָמְרִ֤י <sup>559 </sup> <n>When I say</n> לָֽרָשָׁע֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>unto the wicked</n> מ֣וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>Thou shalt surely</n> תָּמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>die</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>out</n> הִזְהַרְתּ֗וֹ <sup>2094 </sup> <n>and thou givest him not warning</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> דִבַּ֛רְתָּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>nor speakest</n> לְהַזְהִ֥יר <sup>2094 </sup> <n>to warn</n> רָשָׁ֛ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n> מִדַּרְכּ֥וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>way</n> הָרְשָׁעָ֖ה <sup>7563 </sup> <n>from his wicked</n> לְחַיֹּת֑וֹ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>to save his life</n> ה֤וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>that</n> רָשָׁע֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the same wicked</n> בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>in his iniquity</n> יָמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[man] shall die</n> וְדָמ֖וֹ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>but his blood</n> מִיָּדְךָ֥ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>at thine hand</n> אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>will I require</n>
19: וְאַתָּה֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>Yet</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> הִזְהַ֣רְתָּ <sup>2094 </sup> <n>Yet if thou warn</n> רָשָׁ֔ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> שָׁב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and he turn</n> מֵֽרִשְׁע֔וֹ <sup>7562 </sup> <n>not from his wickedness</n> וּמִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>way</n> הָרְשָׁעָ֑ה <sup>7563 </sup> <n>nor from his wicked</n> ה֚וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>in his iniquity</n> יָמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall die</n> וְאַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>thy soul</n> הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>but thou hast delivered</n> ס
20: וּבְשׁ֨וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[man] doth turn</n> צַדִּ֤יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>When a righteous</n> מִצִּדְקוֹ֙ <sup>6664 </sup> <n>from his righteousness</n> וְעָ֣שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and commit</n> עָ֔וֶל <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> וְנָתַתִּ֥י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and I lay</n> מִכְשׁ֛וֹל <sup>4383 </sup> <n>a stumblingblock</n> לְפָנָ֖יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָמ֑וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>him he shall die</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>since</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> הִזְהַרְתּוֹ֙ <sup>2094 </sup> <n>because thou hast not given him warning</n> בְּחַטָּאת֣וֹ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>in his sin</n> יָמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall die</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִזָּכַ֗רְןָ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>shall not be remembered</n> צִדְקֹתָו֙ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and his righteousness</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which he hath done</n> וְדָמ֖וֹ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>but his blood</n> מִיָּדְךָ֥ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>at thine hand</n> אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>will I require</n>
21: וְאַתָּ֞ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>However</n> כִּ֧י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> הִזְהַרְתּ֣וֹ <sup>2094 </sup> <n>Nevertheless if thou warn</n> צַדִּ֗יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n> לְבִלְתִּ֥י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>should not</n> חֲטֹ֛א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>sin</n> צַדִּ֖יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>[man] that the righteous</n> וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> חָטָ֑א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>not and he doth not sin</n> חָי֤וֹ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>he shall surely</n> יִֽחְיֶה֙ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>live</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> נִזְהָ֔ר <sup>2094 </sup> <n>because he is warned</n> וְאַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>thy soul</n> הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>also thou hast delivered</n> ס
22: וַתְּהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עָלַ֛י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>was on</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> יַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>And the hand</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>was there upon me and he said</n> אֵלַ֗י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> ק֥וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>unto me Arise</n> צֵא֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>go forth</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַבִּקְעָ֔ה <sup>1237 </sup> <n>into the plain</n> וְשָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and I will there talk</n> אוֹתָֽךְ׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>
23: וָאָקוּם֮ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Then I arose</n> וָאֵצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and went forth</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַבִּקְעָה֒ <sup>1237 </sup> <n>into the plain</n> וְהִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> שָׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> כְּבוֹד־ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>and behold the glory</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> עֹמֵ֔ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stood</n> כַּכָּב֕וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>there as the glory</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> רָאִ֖יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>which I saw</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> נְהַר־ <sup>5104 </sup> <n>by the river</n> כְּבָ֑ר <sup>3529 </sup> <n>of Chebar</n> וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and I fell</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> פָּנָֽי׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>on my face</n>
24: וַתָּבֹא־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>entered</n> בִ֣י ר֔וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>Then the spirit</n> וַתַּעֲמִדֵ֖נִי <sup>5975 </sup> <n>into me and set</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> רַגְלָ֑י <sup>7272 </sup> <n>me upon my feet</n> וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and spake</n> אֹתִי֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>with me and said</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> בֹּ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>unto me Go</n> הִסָּגֵ֖ר <sup>5462 </sup> <n>shut</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>thyself within</n> בֵּיתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>thine house</n>
25: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>But thou O son</n> אָדָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> נָתְנ֤וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>behold they shall put</n> עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עֲבוֹתִ֔ים <sup>5688 </sup> <n>bands</n> וַֽאֲסָר֖וּךָ <sup>631 </sup> <n>upon thee and shall bind</n> בָּהֶ֑ם וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>you cannot</n> תֵצֵ֖א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>thee with them and thou shalt not go out</n> בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n>
26: וּלְשֽׁוֹנְךָ֙ <sup>3956 </sup> <n>And I will make thy tongue</n> אַדְבִּ֣יק <sup>1692 </sup> <n>cleave</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> חִכֶּ֔ךָ <sup>2441 </sup> <n>to the roof of thy mouth</n> וְנֶֽאֱלַ֔מְתָּ <sup>481 </sup> <n>that thou shalt be dumb</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and cannot</n> תִֽהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָהֶ֖ם לְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> מוֹכִ֑יחַ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>rebukes</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> מְרִ֖י <sup>4805 </sup> <n>for they [are] a rebellious</n> הֵֽמָּה׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n>
27: וּֽבְדַבְּרִ֤י <sup>1696 </sup> <n>But when I speak</n> אֽוֹתְךָ֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> אֶפְתַּ֣ח <sup>6605 </sup> <n>thee I will open</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פִּ֔יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>thy mouth</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and thou shalt say</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> כֹּ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto them Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהֹוִ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Jehovah</n> הַשֹּׁמֵ֤עַ ׀ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>He that heareth</n> יִשְׁמָע֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>let him hear</n> וְהֶחָדֵ֣ל ׀ <sup>2310 </sup> <n>and he that forbeareth</n> יֶחְדָּ֔ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>let him forbear</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> מְרִ֖י <sup>4805 </sup> <n>for they [are] a rebellious</n> הֵֽמָּה׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> ס
